docs.snippet: Our advices from Great Salt Lake City by way of San Francisco are to the 3d of November. The proposition to declare BRIGHAM YOUNG" Prophet, Seer and Revelator" of the Mormon people, was sustained unanimously in the Tabernacle.

headline.main: LATE AND IMPORTANT FROM UTAH.; DEFIANT SPEECHES OF BRIGHAM YOUNG. Mormon Preparations for Hostilities Exaggerated Reports of their Strength.

docs.lead_paragraph: Our advices from Great Salt Lake City by way of San Francisco are to the 3d of November. The proposition to declare BRIGHAM YOUNG" Prophet, Seer and Revelator" of the Mormon people, was sustained unanimously in the Tabernacle.

headline.main: NEW-JERSEY.; FINANCIAL CONDITION OF JERSEY CITY.

docs.lead_paragraph: FINANCIAL CONDITION OF JERSEY CITY.--The Finance Committee of the Jersey City Common Council have made the Common Council have made the following the report of appropriations for the year commencing May 1, 1857, and of the expenditures since that date:

headline.main: Important from Central and South America; Details of the Capture of Colonel Anderson's Force--Accept of the San Juan by Captain Sands, of the Susquehanna--Anderson Pressed by Costa Ricans--Destruction of Property Before the Retreat--List of Fillibusters. TWO WEEKS LATER FROM THE SOUTH PACIFIC. The New-Grandian Press on the Convention with the United States. Capture of the Fillibuster Force Under Col. Anderson by the Susquehanna. INTERESTING PARTICULARS.

docs.snippet: Revolting Parricide at Thompson's Mills, N.Y. CONFESSION OF THE MURDER. The Utica Telegraph has the following particulars of the terrible tragedy at Poolville, or Thompson's Mills, near Hamilton, N. Y.,--not Hamilton Canada, as the telegram...
docs.lead_paragraph: Revolting Parricide at Thompson's Mills, N.Y. CONFESSION OF THE MURDER. The Utica Telegraph has the following particulars of the terrible tragedy at Poolville, or Thompson's Mills, near Hamilton, N. Y.,--not Hamilton Canada, as the telegram erroneously stated a day or two ago: HAMILTON, Tuesday, Jan. 12, 1858.

docs.snippet: The Valley of Wyoming is classic ground. Its history is full of interest, and many of its truthful tales far exceed the fictions of romance in the strangeness of their circumstances. Much has been written of Wyoming, in both prose and verse -many...

headline.main: Dr. Spencer's History of the United States and the Wyoming Survivors.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Valley of Wyoming is classic ground. Its history is full of interest, and many of its truthful tales far exceed the fictions of romance in the strangeness of their circumstances. Much has been written of Wyoming, in both prose and verse -many things which are true and some which are not true.

docs.snippet: The steamship Empire City, from New-York 2d inst, vid Havana 9th inst., has arrived at the Balize. She connected at Havana with the steamship Granada from Aspinwall, and brings the California mails of the 20th ult. The steamship Star of the West left...

headline.main: TWO WEEKS LATER FROM CALIFORNIA.; Surrender of Col. Anderson, &c. $1,600,000 in Treasure en route. IMPORTANT FROM NICARAGUA. Arrival of the Empire City at New-Orleans.

docs.lead_paragraph: The steamship Empire City, from New-York 2d inst, vid Havana 9th inst., has arrived at the Balize. She connected at Havana with the steamship Granada from Aspinwall, and brings the California mails of the 20th ult. The steamship Star of the West left Aspinwall on the 4th for New-York direct, with the California mails and $1,600,000 in treasure. The U. S. steamer Fulton, Lieut.
